data.name: With You - Tip Jar
data.detailed_description:
If you enjoyed your time playing With You, this is a way of saying "thanks" to the developer by tossing a coin into the tip jar.

Nothing about the game changes. Thanks for your support! <3
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: If you enjoyed your time playing With You, this is a way of saying "thanks" to the developer by tossing a coin into the tip jar. Nothing about the game changes. Thanks for your support! <3

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 3.00GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9+
  • Processor: 3.00GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus Graphics 645
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Linux
  • Processor: 3.00GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
